title: 28. Black and White Rainbows - Bush
text: PLATINUM AT THE END OF THE RAINBOW It's always a great year when Bush releases a new album. These guys continue to evolve and get better with time.Loving the new single and stoked to hear what Gavin, Corey, Robin & CT3 bring on this new album. ðŸ¤¢ðŸ¤¢ðŸ¤¢ by Nstar32 Mad love is one of the worst songs I've heard in some time; if this is a preview of the rest of the album... ...what happened to this band? Biography Formed: 1992 in London, England Genre: Rock Years Active: '90s, '00s, '10s Led by guitarist/vocalist Gavin Rossdale, Bush was the first post-Nirvana British band to hit it big in America. Of course, they became a hit by playing by the grunge rules -- they had loud guitars, guttural vocals, stop-start rhythms, and extreme dynamics. Formed in late 1992 by Rossdale, Bush landed an American record deal before they had a British label. Their debut album, Sixteen Stone, produced by Clive Langer and Alan Winstanley (producers of early-'80s hits by Madness and Elvis Costello, among... Top Albums and Songs by Bush 1.
